title: Wirecast Pro 6.0.4 {UNNGH}
description: [size=200][color=orange]Description:[/color][/size] [size=120]Wirecast lets you capture an unlimited number of input devices from live camera feeds, iOS cameras (coming soon), computer desktop, Web feeds, and more. Then add polish and professionalism to your broadcast with live switching, transitions, titles, lower thirds, and more. And finally, use the built in multiformat encoding capabilities and easily stream to integrated streaming services and CDNs.[/size] [size=200][color=blue]How to install:[/color][/size] 1. Use the keymaker to generate a serial and activation key. These will only work on the system they were generated. 2. Block the following address either with your firewall or hosts file: store.esellerate.net 3. Enter the serial into the application and select continue. It may ask you to restart to activate product. 4. When prompted, select "I already have an Activation Key and would like to activate now" and enter activation key. 5. Done! [size=200][color=red]Note:[/color][/size] To be able to access offline activation you *MUST* block store.esellerate.net in some manner. Going offline to register isn't enough because the application will sometimes attempt to check on launch. Other connections besides store.esellerate.net are ok to let through for now however that may change in the future. [size=120][color=red]How to block websites with hosts file:[/color][/size] 1. Open Terminal from /Applications Ã¢â€ â€™ /Utilities Ã¢â€ â€™ Terminal.app 2. Type "sudo nano /etc/hosts" and hit enter. 3. Terminal will ask for password so input it. 4. Your hosts file will open. 5. scroll to the bottom and add this line "127.0.0.1 store.esellerate.net"(no quotes). 6. hit Ctrl-O and your done!
